structure.unit: ARTICLE C. - USE OF SANITARY SEWER SYSTEM [4]

text.section: Grease and septage haulers must hold a permit issued by DENR to engage in the business activity for any person, consumer or user discharging waste water to the POTW.

Any person, consumer or user using a grease and septage hauler not holding a current and valid license issued by DENR is in violation of this article. (Ord. No. 2011-981, ยง1, 12-6-11) DIVISION 3. - FEES
